+
+TEST(atomic_int, Basic) {
+    atomic_int i;
+    EXPECT_EQ(0, i.load());
+    EXPECT_EQ(1, ++i);
+    EXPECT_EQ(1, i.load());
+    EXPECT_EQ(10, i += 9);
+    EXPECT_EQ(10, i.load());
+    EXPECT_EQ(9, --i);
+    EXPECT_EQ(9, i.load());
+    EXPECT_EQ(4, i -= 5);
+
+    atomic_int j(42);
+    EXPECT_EQ(42, j.load());
+}
